name: Assessment
description: The Assessment class is used to provide the analyzer's assessment of an event -- its impact, actions taken in response, and confidence.

Impact.name: Impact
Impact.description: The analyzer's assessment of the impact of the event on the target(s).

Action.name: Action
Action.description: The action(s) taken by the analyzer in response to the event.

Confidence.name: Confidence
Confidence.description: A measurement of the confidence the analyzer has in its evaluation of the event.
